scene_description_enriched: The Virgin Mary, depicted with a golden halo, is seated and cradling the Christ Child, who also has a golden halo. She wears a blue mantle over a red garment. Behind her is a grey, stepped architectural structure with decorative elements. To the right, a kneeling figure in a black robe, with hands clasped in prayer and a golden halo, looks up towards the Virgin and Child. The background is a textured pink with gold scrollwork, and the scene is bordered by a red frame with decorative elements on the right edge.
scene_interpretation: Madonna and Child with a Donor
